info.description: API for Campus Project Hub - Platform untuk berbagi project kampus
info.title: Campus Project Hub API

get.description: Get paginated list of articles with optional filters
Get article details by article ID

put.description: Update an existing article (owner or admin only)

delete.description: Delete an article (owner or admin only)

get.description: Initiate GitHub OAuth flow
Handle GitHub OAuth callback
Initiate Google OAuth flow
Handle Google OAuth callback

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password
Logout current user (client should clear token)

get.description: Get authenticated user profile with gamification stats

post.description: Generate new token pair using refresh token
Create a new user account with email and password

400.description: Invalid input or email already exists

get.description: Get all categories with project counts
Get category details by category ID

delete.description: Delete a comment (owner, project owner, admin, or moderator)

get.description: Get gamification configuration (EXP values, levels)
Get current user's gamification stats
Get paginated list of projects with optional filters
Get project details by project ID

put.description: Update an existing project (owner or admin only)

delete.description: Delete a project (owner or admin only)

get.description: Get paginated list of comments for a project

post.description: Add a comment to a project

get.description: Get paginated list of user's transactions

post.description: Initiate a payment transaction for a project

get.description: Get all transactions (admin only)
Check if user has purchased a project

post.description: Upload a file (image, PDF, or ZIP)

get.description: Get paginated list of users (admin only)
Get top users by EXP
Get user profile by user ID

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
